value.title: Stock futures point to recovery after Wall Street carnage
value.excerpt: U.S. stock index futures pointed to a strong bounce at the open on Friday, rising 5% on hopes of a U.S. stimulus package to cushion the blow of the coronavirus pandemic, a day after Wall Street racked up its worst losses since “Black Monday” in 1987.
